name: get_random_word
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dicolink.
Tool description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
API description: Fetches a random word based on specified criteria from the Dicolink API.

verbeconjugue.description: Whether to fetch a conjugated verb. Defaults to None.

minlong.description: Minimum length of the word. Defaults to '5'.

maxlong.description: Maximum length of the word. Defaults to '-1' for no maximum.

avecdef.description: Whether to include the definition of the word. Defaults to None.
